name: FPS Weapon Controller Demo Level
description:
This is the playable test level of the FPS weapon controller asset pack, created as part of a university project for educational purposes. The actual code assets can be downloaded from the Unity Asset Store under FPS Weapon Controller Code Asset Pack.

Functionality:

  • Weapon swapping mechanic allows you to easily control which weapon asset you have equipped.
  • Weapon class script allows you to copy and paste a simple sub-class and place any sort of firearm based weapon into your game in minutes.
  • A simple weapon attachment system, built into the parent weapon class, allows you to simply swap out attachments through a clear place holder UI.
  • Load-out saving and loading functionality allows you to keep track of weapon attachment and unlock progress.
  • Scoring system allows you to control the system of purchasing attachments.
  • Simple place holder assets and animations make it clear where your creative assets are meant to go.
  • A kill-feed allows you to receive real time updates on ammo pickups, kills, and attachment swaps and purchases.
  • A simple scoping system allows you to control different types of scopes, such as simple RDS sights or long-range sniper scopes.
  • The code is here, for those who want to make an FPS game but don't want to write the code. This will save the more creative developers time as they focus on assets like models, sound and art.
